Public Remarks: Last night I dreamt of the perfect home, it was located in a quiet residential area and generated an incredible income! Our family would walk across the street and play tennis together, then decide where we wanted to go for dinner, because living close to Lonsdale offers so many great choices. The dream continued... I prepared for work the next day in my home office and the kids walked to school with their friends in the neighbourhood. I made a cup of coffee and looked out from my desk, on to nature, but my thoughts were not about work.. I was planning dinner for the friends we were having over that evening, because we love to entertain! The only troubling part of my dream was that I couldn't figure out if I should rent out the extra bedroom on Air BNB or open a Daycare. What would you do?

Public Remarks: Come home to country life on Bowen Island. This charming four-bedroom beautifully renovated character home sits on an extraordinary 2.5 acres overlooking a meadow, year-round brook, fenced gardens, orchard, three-stall barn and woods. Bounded by Crippen Park & the Killarney Lake Trail. Paddle your canoe out on the lake or just step out into the great outdoors of your own acreage. The home features a grand entrance, two spaces for offices and huge sun-drenched deck. Comes with henhouse, apples, pears and figs, frogs that choir on summer nights, and lots of wildlife that call this property home. Swim in the sea at the local Mt. Gardner Dock. Close to Snug Cove village & ferry. All a part of a diverse and vibrant island community with excellent schools just twenty minutes to West Vancouver.
